Class MoneyHandler

java.lang.Object
MoneyHandler
public class MoneyHandler extends Object
Stores and conducts operations on all money inside the Vending Machine

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MoneyHandler()
    A constructor that creates an instance of the ProductDispenser object.

    • MoneyHandler

      public MoneyHandler()
      A constructor that creates an instance of the ProductDispenser object.

  • Method Details

    • newCashBox

      public void newCashBox()
      Called to initialize the cashBox to default values. Only used when a new Vending Machine is created.

    • displayDenomList

      public void displayDenomList()
      Displays the stock of all bills inside the Vending Machine

    • inputDenominations

      public void inputDenominations(Scanner s)
      Gets money input from the user and stores it into the holder (basically temp) array
      Parameters:
      s - The active scanner object

    • cashOut

      public void cashOut()
      Completely empties the cashBox

    • cashOne

      public void cashOne(int denomination, int numOfDenom)
      Deducts (or cashes out) a bill's stock by an amount
      Parameters:
      denomination - The bill value to be cashed out
      numOfDenom - The number of bills to be cashed out

    • refillOne

      public boolean refillOne(int denomination, int denomAdd)
      Replenishes a bill's stock by an amount
      Parameters:
      denomination - The bill value to be replenished
      denomAdd - The number of bills to be replenished
      Returns:
      Whether or not the bill value was valid

    • payment

      public boolean payment(Item selectedItem, Scanner s)
      Conducts the payment process during product transaction
      Parameters:
      selectedItem - The item selected by the user for purchase
      s - The active scanner object
      Returns:
      Whether or not the payment was successfully performed

    • breakdownChange

      public void breakdownChange(int change)
      Splits the user's given change into its separate bill form
      Parameters:
      change - The total amount of change to be issued

    • checkChange

      public boolean checkChange()
      Checks if the Vending Machine has sufficient bills to dispense needed change
      Returns:
      Whether there is enough bill stock for dispensing

    • getTotal

      public int getTotal()
      Computes for and returns the sum of money stored in this Vending Machine's cashBox
      Returns:
      The total amount of money stored in the cashBox of the Vending Machine

    • getCashIn

      public int getCashIn()
      Computes for and returns the sum of money stored in this Vending Machine's holder array
      Returns:
      The total amount of money stored in the holder array of the Vending Machine

    • getCashBoxAmount

      public int getCashBoxAmount(int index)
      Finds the number of bill stock given the bill's index
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the bill
      Returns:
      The available stock of the bill

    • setCashBox

      public void setCashBox(int index, int amount)
      Sets the stock of a certain bill to a new amount
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the bill
      amount - The new amount of stock
